text: @realDonaldTrump Hey, instead of going on about this nonsense how about you work on finding our schools that are hurting badly due to coronavirus! Teachers are starting to be laid off,  while states are cutting budgets in spite of expenses increasing due to coronavirus! Where is the help?!??
